fields.value: WHICH FACTORS EXPLAIN THE ALLOCATION OF THE BRAZILIAN HUMANITARIAN COOPERATION (2007-2014)?

datasetContactAffiliation.value: Federal University of Pernambuco/University of Antwerp

dsDescriptionValue.value: This study uses original data previously available at the General Coordination for International Actions Against Hunger and Humanitarian Cooperation's (CGFome, in Portuguese) website until 2016, when the Unit was closed and had its activities shared between the Brazilian Cooperation Agency (ABC, in Portuguese) and the Social Issues Division (DTS, in Portuguese), both from the MRE. The data is divided into Financial Contributions to and through International Organizations and in-kind donation, covering the period 2007-2014.

files.description: Dataset in format .xls to all users. Additionally, a "Read me" sheet follows this documents.

files.description: Dataset with original information from the General Coordination for International Actions Against Hunger and Humanitarian Cooperation (CGFome), including missing values, administrative costs paid and donations to multiple countries (these three groups are not analyzed in the other files).
